snippet: The mother of a mentally disturbed inmate, Patrick Miller, had filed a lawsuit charging that he was beaten to death by correction officers at Bellevue Hospital Center.
abstract: New York City agrees to pay $1.5 million to settle a lawsuit filed by the mother of a mentally disturbed inmate whose lawyers charged that he was beaten to death after a struggle with correction officers in Bellevue Hospital Center's prison ward in 2007; Patrick Miller had punched a correction officer, for which lawyers contend he was fatally beaten in retaliation.
lead_paragraph: The mother of a mentally disturbed inmate, Patrick Miller, had filed a lawsuit charging that he was beaten to death by correction officers at Bellevue Hospital Center.

headline.seo: New York Agrees to $1.5 Million Settlement in Death of Patrick Miller, Bellevue Inmate
headline.main: City Settles Lawsuit Over Death of Inmate
headline.print_headline: City Settles Lawsuit Over Death Of Inmate
